ago LONDON( Reuters)- The British prime minister's communications chief Andy Coulson resigned on Friday, as prosecutors stepped up their inquiries into illegal phone hacking at a tabloid newspaper when he was editor. We confirm that Andy Coulson has resigned, an official in Prime Minister David Cameron 's office said. Michael Vick 's got it all at this point," Eagles offensive coordinator Marty Mornhinweg said. Really, the most important quality, in my opinion, for a quarterback to have is gut instincts, then comes the decision-making and the timing and accuracy. Then comes the big arm and athleticism and those types of things. The gut instincts are critical for a quarterback, and you can see that. Not only did Michael Vick make a remarkable turnaround on the field, but his image is improving away from the game. For all tax issues and all spending issues, it's always about priorities, said the senator. "So, my focus is on who needs the tax deductions, who needs the tax cuts the most. Bernie Sanders Dan Lungren ( R., Calif.), an ally of the late Mr. Jack Kemp . "There's nobody in this House who's taken as serious a long-term view on the budget as Paul Ryan Day ."
